perks.name: Military Hardware
perks.description: May purchase a single tank and single helicopter.

perks.name: Well Stocked
perks.description: Any weapon with 3 ammo has 4 ammo.

perks.name: Televised Carnage
perks.description: If a vehicle causes 6+ hits in one attack, before evades, gain +1 Audience Vote.

perks.name: Virtuoso
perks.description: The first time each vehicle pushes it, they do not gain a Hazard Token.

perks.name: Evasive Maneouvres
perks.description: Before making an evade roll, gain Hazard Tokens to add +1 to each evade dice for every Hazard Token.

perks.name: Showing Off
perks.description: Gsin an audience vote for each vehicle, if all vehicles resolved a spin, slide and shift result.

perks.name: Thumpermonkey
perks.description: May purchase electrical weapons and upgrades.

perks.name: Dynamo
perks.description: After a vehicle activates in Phase 4, 5, or 6, add +1 Ammo Token to a single electrical weapon or upgrade.

perks.name: All the Toys
perks.description: When attacking with a type of weapon that has not been attacked with this game, gain +1 Audience Vote.

perks.name: N2O Addict
perks.description: May purchase the Nitro upgrade at half cost.

perks.name: Speed Demon
perks.description: When a vehicle uses Nitro, only gain up to 3 Hazard Tokens.

perks.name: Cult of Speed
perks.description: When a vehicle selects a long straight in gear phase 1, 2, or 3, gain +1 Audience Vote.

perks.name: Live Fast
perks.description: If a vehicle begins the wipeout step with more Hazard Tokens than hull points, +1 Audience Vote.

perks.name: Pinball
perks.description: If a vehicle is involved in a sideswipe smash, immediately resolves another movement step.

perks.name: Prison Cars
perks.description: May purchase the Prison Car upgrade.

perks.name: Fireworks
perks.description: If a vehicle explodes, gain +1 Audience Vote if it is middleweight and +2 Audience Vote if it is heavyweight.
